file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-23-07-04 - CONFIG-1 - SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the service-door trim shroud assembly. B. The service-door trim shroud assembly is installed in the passenger cabin, at zone 232. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEM- 25-23-07-000-801-A EMB-145 BLY - REMOVAL ACFT MODEL(S) SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEM- 25-23-07-400-801-A EMB-145 BLY - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 25-23-07 Page 1 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-07-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 2. SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the service-door trim shroud assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION S.B.145-25-0128 - SRM 51-20-01 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-005-A (1) Remove the sealant from around the base of the door forward corner (3) and the base of the door aft corner (41) (SRM 51-20-01). (2) Remove the screws (1) and (6), washers (2) and (5), and spacer (4) that attach the door forward corner (3). (3) Remove the screws (38) and (43), washers (39) and (42), and spacer (40) that attach the door aft corner (41). (4) Remove the screws (8), washers (9), and spacers (10) that attach the door lower vertical trim shroud (7). (5) For aircraft with shock absorber cover (17) do this step: (a) Remove the screws (11), (13) and (15) and washers (12), (14) and (16) that attach the shock absorber cover (17). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-23-07 Page 2 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) For aircraft POST-MOD S.B.145-25-0128 and POST-MOD S.B. 145-25-0178 with waste compartment at the forward galley (refer to VIEW B, Figure 401, sheet 1 and sheet 2), do these steps: (a) Open the waste compartment door (21). (b) Remove the screws (19) and washers (20) that attach the lower fairing (18) to the waste compartment. (7) For aircraft without waste compartment at the forward galley (refer to VIEW B, Figure 401, sheet 1 and sheet 2), do this step: (a) Remove the lower fairing (18) that is attached with Velcro fasteners. (8) Remove the screws (23) and washers (24) that attach the handle (22) (Refer to DET. C, Figure 401, sheet 1 and sheet 3), as applicable. (9) Remove the screws (25), washers (26) and spacers (27) that attach the door forward vertical trim shroud (28) (Refer to DET. B, Figure 401, sheet 1 and sheet 3). (10) Remove the screws (29) and (31) and washers (30) and (32) that attach the door upper trim shroud (33). Refer to DET. A, Figure 401, sheet 1. (11) Remove the screws (34), washers (35) and spacers (36) that attach the aft vertical trim shroud (37). Refer to DET. A, Figure 401, sheet 1. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-23-07 Page 3 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

SCREW 8. SCREW 34. SCREW 4. SPACER 36. SPACER 5. WASHER 7. DOOR LOWER VERTICAL 39. WASHER TRIM SHROUD 38. SCREW 6. SCREW 2. WASHER 40. SPACER 3. DOOR FORWARD 1. SCREW CORNER DET. A 41. DOOR AFT 42. DOOR FORWARD VERTICAL TRIM SHROUD 27. SPACER 22. HANDLE 26. WASHER 25. SCREW 3 DET. C 24. WASHER 23. SCREW 28. DOOR FORWARD VERTICAL TRIM SHROUD 22. HANDLE 3 AIRCRAFT PRE-MOD. S.B. 145-25-0141 4 AIRCRAFT POST-MOD. S.B. 145-25-0141 4 DET. C 145AMM250613.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-23-07 Page 6 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-07-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 3. SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the service-door trim shroud assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION SRM 51-20-01 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) RTV 780 (black) Sealant AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-005-A (1) Remove the old sealant (SRM 51-20-01). (2) Install the aft vertical trim shroud (37) with the screws (34), washers (35), and spacers (36). Refer to DET. A, Figure 401, sheet 1. (3) Install the door upper trim shroud (33) with the screws (31) and (29) and washers (30) and (32). Refer to DET. A, Figure 401, sheet 1. (4) Install the door forward vertical trim shroud (28) with the screws (25), washers (26) and spacers (27) (Refer to DET. C, Figure 401, sheet 1 and sheet 3), as applicable. (5) Install the handle (22) with the screws (23) and washers (24) (Refer to DET. C, Figure 401, sheet 1 and sheet 3), as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-23-07 Page 7 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) For aircraft POST-MOD 145-25-0128 and POST-MOD 145-25-0178 with waste compartment at the forward galley (refer to VIEW B, Figure 401, sheet 1 and sheet 2), do this step: (a) Install the lower fairing (18) with the screws (19) and washers (20). (7) For aircraft without waste compartment at the forward galley (refer to VIEW B, Figure 401, sheet 1 and sheet 2), do this step: (a) Install the lower fairing (18) with Velcro fasteners. (8) For aircraft with shock absorber cover (17) do these steps: (a) Fit the shock absorber cover (17) in the correct position. (b) Tighten the screws (11), (13) and (15) and washers (12), (14) and (16) that attach the shock absorber cover (17). (9) Install the door lower vertical trim shroud (7) with the screws (8), washers (9), and spacers (10). (10) Install the door forward corner (3) with the screws (1) and (6), washers (2) and (5), and spacer (4). (11) Install the door aft corner (41) with the screws (38) and (43), washers (39) and (42), and spacer (40). (12) Apply the sealant around the base of the door forward corner (3) and the base of the door aft corner (41) (SRM 51-20-01). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-23-07 Page 8 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
